About

Newton built the first practical reflecting telescope and developed a sophisticated theory of colour.

In the Principia, Newton formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation that formed the dominant scientific viewpoint until it was superseded by the theory of relativity. Newton used his mathematical description of gravity to derive Kepler's laws of planetary motion, account for tides, the trajectories of comets, the precession of the equinoxes and other phenomena, eradicating doubt about the Solar System's heliocentricity.

Click me!

Featured Designers

Yves Klein

This iconic cocktail table was done by Yves Klein, one of the most influential, prominent, and controversial French artists to emerge in the 1950s, also known as a forerunner of Minimal art as well as Pop art.

More

Click me!

Vladimir Kagan

Vladimir Kagan is one of my favorite furniture designers from the 20th century. His mid-century modern pieces defined the curves of the era.

More

Click me!

George Nakashima

George Nakashima’s New lounge chair is an iconic example of American-Japanese design. Through the use of a free-form arm, which accentuates the wood’s natural characteristics, he reveals nature’s beauty.

More

Click me!

Charlotte Perriand

The use of humble materials to create elegant and iconic pieces of furniture is extremely hard to do. Charlotte Perriand was able to create beautiful, functional furniture with as little design as possible.

More

Click me!

Selected Clients

Van Den Weghe

Design - Research

More +

Belgium-based Van Den Weghe is a high-end natural stone company with a keen eye for enduring quality. Crafting a range of luxury items for residential projects, the brand offers over 700 aesthetically striking varieties of stone.

Muuto

Research – Development

More +

Rooted in a Scandinavian design tradition of simplicity, functionality and craftsmanship, Muuto uses new materials and techniques to create forward-thinking products that provide new perspectives on time-honoured forms.

MZPA

Design

More +

Specialising in wood-based pieces, MZPA offers creative objects that place well-being at the forefront of production. Featured above is The Planet, an innovative geometric workspace which facilitates communication and idea generation.

Laufen

Design - Development

More +

Combining Swiss and Italian trends, Laufen’s sleek and sustainable bathrooms transform functional spaces into dynamic living environments. Focusing on water conservation, the results are precisely crafted and ecologically friendly.

Poliform

Design

More +

Poliform is an Italian contemporary furniture brand offering wardrobe systems, tables, seating, soft furnishings and a new kitchen brand, Varenna. Providing bespoke pieces, it curates interiors that are calm and elegantly designed.
